<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1beta/workloads/{name}/export"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Export a workload's run configuration as JSON

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Workload name","in":"path","name":"name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
